name: Until Dawn Tomorrow
description:
UNTIL DAWN TOMORROW

An eerie point and click puzzle game. No saves, no loading: a one-shot short story! 
Walk among Stephan's odd nightmare, in this homage to the expressionist cinema's masterpieces "The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari" and "Genuine" by R. Wiene.

Will you be able to understand what is going on?

HOW TO PLAY:

Mouse Left Click: Navigate, collect, equip and use items

Mouse Right Click: Drop equipped items

FEATURES:

. Hand drawn backgrounds and animations.

. Immersive atmosphere and cinema quotes.

. Original soundtrack.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

No installation needed! Just unzip and enjoy.

IMPORTANT: 

. If you have issues with the mouse speed, you can easily fix it in the Gamesetup located in the same folder which includes the exe.

. Also, you can change the resolution in the Gamesetup.

AUTHOR COMMENT:

Until Dawn Tomorrow is my first attempt at the point and click world. Be trustful on future projects! 

This game is translated by Diego Delfino. Big up for him!

This game is totally free, but it took a lot of work, time and energy! If you like my ideas/projects/arts, please consider making a donation:
you will help me to create more games!
